caption.p: Proportion of drug–drug interaction mechanisms between outpatient medications and HCV regimens. Abbreviations: BCRP, breast cancer resistance protein; CYP, cytochrome P450 enzyme; IMDH, inosine-5’-monophosphate dehydrogenase; INR, international normalized ratio; OATP, organic anion transporting polypeptide; PEG-IFN, pegylated interferon; P-gp, P-glycoprotein; UGT, UDP-glucuronosyltransferase.
